Class MainGUI

java.lang.Object
  ui.BaseUI
      ui.MainGUI

public class MainGUI
extends BaseUI

Main window of the Rat Monitoring Tool, it has links to all program portions.

setController

public void setController(ControllerUI controller)
Description copied from class: BaseUI
Registers the controller with the GUI. the Controller is the one who instantiates the GUI, so it has to register itself with the GUI for the GUI to be able to communicate with the controller.

Overrides:
